subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Eagles have rushed to the front of the pack of N.F.L. chaos, and some sports columnists feel the team has  quit on Coach Andy Reid, who will spend the rest of the season regarded as already fired.
snippet: The Philadelphia Eagles have rushed to the front of the pack of N.F.L. chaos, and some sports columnists feel the team has  quit on Coach Andy Reid, who will spend the rest of the season regarded as already fired.
